vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.15.18
§ Mikneiah = "possession of Jehovah"
one of the Levites of the 2nd rank, gatekeepers of the ark, appointed by David to play in the temple band
vocabInfos._es_Definition: levita; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
彌克尼雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華的產業"
被大衛指派在聖幕中任音樂事奉的利未人
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
弥克尼雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华的产业"
被大卫指派在圣幕中任音乐事奉的利未人
